text: Jwalakwe ni Jwandanda (pangali chilichose paujo Pakwe), soni Jwambesi (pangali chilichose panyuma Pakwe), soni Jwapenani kusyene (pangali chilichose pachanya Pakwe), soni Jwakuŵandika nnope (ni umanyilisyi Wakwe, pangali chakuŵandika nnope kupunda Jwalakwe), soni Jwalakwe chindu chilichose juŵele Jwaachimanya chenene
